title: How can I share a network with computers and play games with other Bluetooth devices?
answer:
Your phone can share a network with computers and play games by using Bluetooth. 

 Your phone supports the personal area network (PAN) so that other devices can share the network resources. 

 Touch Settings > Moreâ€¦ > Tethering & portable hotspot > Bluetooth tethering. Upon reception of the connection request from a Bluetooth device, you set up a PAN. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110568) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110569) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110570)

 To play games using Bluetooth, perform the following steps: (This function depends on third-party applications in most cases.) 

 1. Search Bluetooth devices in the game. 

 1. Pair your phone with other Bluetooth devices. 

 1. Start the game.
